title: The Big Cat
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR110L
description: In The Big Cat, students will read about the things the big cat does at home. High-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed, humorous illustrations support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as well as ask and answer questions as they read this interesting story about a busy cat.
reviewWords: cat, cleans, climbs, eats, hides, looks, plays, runs, sleeps
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word the
